attributes.action: Prohibit El Al landing rights in UK till Israel respects Palestinians human rights
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Israel has long ignored basic rights of Palestinians and has abused her military might. Today Israel has ignored UN demands and has in opinion of Red Cross created war crimes. Neither US nor UK seems prepared to take any meaningful action so banning El Al in UK may have some effect on her domestic opinions.
